segments.text: There is too much traffic in Taipei these days , I think cars should be banned .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure about that . How would people get to work ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , why not use buses or the MET ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it may not be that simple . Not everyone likes public transport .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? There is nothing wrong with our buses and trains .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't often use them , I wouldn't really know .
segments.speaker: S2
